f6816a5e-1146-4f19-bdce-8a4acdf45e8f.description: Earners of the Customer Success Data & AI Azure Synapse Analytics Insider badge have a deep level of technical expertise in how to assess, design and implement an analytic solution using Azure Synapse ecosystem. They have demonstrated technical mastery through a comprehensive multi-month program, which includes eight weeks of deep technical training, knowledge checks, labs, and hands-on delivery phase.
f6816a5e-1146-4f19-bdce-8a4acdf45e8f.name: Azure Synapse Analytics Technical Insider

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Data & AI Insider Program

badge_template_activities.title: Eight technical sessions on Azure Synapse Analytics including hands-on labs, knowledge checks and a Hackathon covering the following topics: Azure Synapse Analytics internals, Architecture patterns, Migration strategies, Synapse security features, compete scenarios, ETL/ELT and reporting use cases.

After completing technical training sessions, the participant moves to the hands-on delivery phase of the Insider Program.  This phase is focused on real-world application of the acquired technical knowledge to implement customer scenarios and includes the design and implementation of a POC scenario followed by a presentation on results. Upon a successful evaluation by their mentor, the participant earns the Insider badge.

skills.name: Identify Components Of A Modern Data Warehouse In Azure

3a6b6002-38a4-4e71-9434-906789717b95.description: Earners of the Customer Success Data & AI SQL Modernization Insider badge have a deep level of technical expertise in how to assess, design and implement SQL as part of multiple application architectures . They have demonstrated technical mastery through a comprehensive multi-month program, which includes deep technical training, knowledge checks and certification.
3a6b6002-38a4-4e71-9434-906789717b95.name: Azure SQL Technical Insider

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Data & AI Insider Program

badge_template_activities.title: Technical sessions on Azure SQL covering the following topics: Security, Performance, Deploy & Configure and Availability.

After completing technical training sessions, the participant moves to the hands-on delivery phase of the Insider Program.  This phase is focused on real-world application of the acquired technical knowledge which can include conducting customer workshops, design reviews, editing and updating Azure SQL documentation and other activities. Outcomes are evaluated by a mentor who then signs off on the Insider badge.
Participants must pass the DP-300 Exam: Administering Relational Databases on Microsoft Azure.

e1b41580-7a61-4ac8-9b3b-194205ddfc0b.description: Earners of the Customer Success Data & AI Data Science Insider badge have a deep level of technical expertise in how to assess, design and implement a Data Science solution through AI Services. They have demonstrated technical mastery through a comprehensive multi-month program, which includes eleven technical sessions, knowledge checks, and a hands-on delivery phase.
e1b41580-7a61-4ac8-9b3b-194205ddfc0b.name: Azure AI & ML Technical Insider

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Data & AI Insider Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants attended eleven technical sessions, on Data Science and AI covering the following topics:  Data Science Life Cycle, AML + Synapse, Databricks, and Cognitive Services and competed in the Data Science challenge solving a business problem.

After completing technical training sessions, the participant moves to the hands-on delivery phase of the Insider Program.  This phase is focused on real-world application of the acquired technical knowledge to implement customer scenarios or execute and participate in the AI WAF pilot. Initially, the participant shadows their mentor and then leads a customer technical session. Upon a successful evaluation by their mentor, the participant earns the Insider badge.

da53ef4e-102a-4392-b0b4-b9959b4c93c0.description: Earners of the Customer Success Data & AI NoSQL Insider badge have a deep level of technical expertise in how to assess, design and implement a NoSQL solution through Cosmos DB on Azure. They have demonstrated technical mastery through a comprehensive multi-month program, which includes nine technical sessions, knowledge checks, and a hands-on delivery phase.
da53ef4e-102a-4392-b0b4-b9959b4c93c0.name: Azure Cosmos DB Technical Insider

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Data & AI Insider Program

badge_template_activities.title: Nine technical sessions on NoSQL with Cosmos DB including four knowledge checks covering the following topics:  Design- Data Modeling & Partitioning Price and Performance Modeling & Criteria Programmability & Dev Experience Production Monitoring & Optimization NoSQL API’s- Cassandra, and Mongo

After completing technical training sessions, the participant moves to the hands-on delivery phase of the Insider Program.  This phase is focused on real-world application of the acquired technical knowledge to implement customer scenarios. Initially, the participant shadows their mentor and then leads a customer technical session. Upon a successful evaluation by their mentor, the participant earns the Insider badge.

2e4badf4-98aa-4683-9864-098f97eaccc0.description: Earners of the Customer Success Data & AI Azure Data Governance Insider badge have a deep level of technical expertise in how to assess, design and implement governance aspects within Azure. They have demonstrated technical mastery through a comprehensive multi-month program, which includes nine technical sessions, knowledge checks, and a hands-on delivery phase.
2e4badf4-98aa-4683-9864-098f97eaccc0.name: Azure Data Governance Technical Insider

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Data & AI Insider Program

badge_template_activities.title: Technical sessions on Azure Data Governance including knowledge checks and customer deliveries.

79d94e22-1812-40d7-b546-816984940337.description: Earners of the Customer Success Data & AI OSS DB Insider badge have a deep level of technical expertise in how to assess, design and implement an Azure Database for PostgreSQL & MySQL. They have demonstrated technical mastery through a comprehensive multi-month program, which includes nine technical sessions, knowledge checks, and a hands-on delivery phase.
79d94e22-1812-40d7-b546-816984940337.name: Azure PostgreSQL Technical Insider

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Data & AI Insider Program

badge_template_activities.title: Nine technical sessions on Azure Database for PostgreSQL and Azure Database for MySQL including four knowledge checks covering the following topics:  Deployment Options (Single Server, Flexible Server, Hyperscale), Design- Data Modeling & Partitioning, Technical Use Cases & Patterns, Performance and Optimization best practices, AKS & App Services Integrations, OSS DB Migrations (Homogenous, Heterogenous, Oracle to PostgreSQL), Migration Tools.

After completing technical training sessions, the participant moves to the hands-on delivery phase of the Insider Program.  This phase is focused on real-world application of the acquired technical knowledge to implement customer scenarios. Initially, the participant shadows their mentor and then leads a customer technical session. Upon a successful evaluation by their mentor, the participant earns the Insider badge.

skills.name: Migrate On-premises MySQL To Azure SQL DB For MySQL
Migrate On-premises PostgreSQL To Azure SQL DB For PostgreSQL
